title: DWR historically-adjusted
simple_description: 100-year historical record with current climate trends
notes: Point-located observation-based time series records of temperature (monthly), precipitation (daily), and streamflow (monthly) at select locations specific to CalSim3 modeling.

title: Warmer and Drier I

notes: HF statistics are used to adjust No.1 records using a quantile-mapping approach.
